trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Burnsville
There were no other sightings in Burnsville on or around March 1st 2004
Summary: Something flying really low over the houses in my neighborhood, no sound
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home one night from work at about 12am. I turned into my culdasac and I noticed something almost hanging from the house accross the street. It was a triangle shaped object flying very low in the sky. Literally I felt like I could touch it. I thought maybe it was a helicopter looking for someone. But I opened my truck window to hear it. And there was no sound. It was flying very slow above the house, Inching along. I thought it was really weird because there was no sound coming from it and it was flying so low. It could have touched the houses if it was any lower. I watched the object continue to move from house to house. And then I got nervous and went into my house. I never told anyone about it until my co-worker told me that he saw this weird thing in the sky on the way home. And I proceeded to explain it to him and he was freakin out. He hadn't told anyone either and I described it just the way he saw it. But like I said, he said that there was no sound coming from it. It was very strange that we both saw it on different nights, but saw the same thing.
